name: moderated-chat-and-real-time-sentiment-analysis
description: Amazon Chime SDK Moderated Chat and Real Time Sentiment Analysis Demo

scripts.sam:build: cd backend && rm -rf .aws-sam && sam build && cd -
scripts.sam:deploy:backend: npm run sam:build && cd backend && sam deploy --resolve-s3 --no-fail-on-empty-changeset && aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name moderated-chat-and-real-time-sentiment-analysis-demo --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs' --output json > appconfig.json && cd -
scripts.sam:deploy:assets: npm run build && aws s3 cp dist s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name moderated-chat-and-real-time-sentiment-analysis-demo --query "Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey=='assetsS3BucketName'].OutputValue" --output text) --recursive
scripts.deploy: npm run sam:deploy:backend && npm run sam:deploy:assets
